about_the_game:
GHOSTHERO: Shadow of Vengeance is a third-person supernatural odyssey where you are brought back to kill the Evil Titan that has destroyed your world. You will have to survive ever-growing waves of attacks during the nights and use the days to gather resources, build your defenses, and ultimately restore your fortress to greatness. Additionally, you will explore the remnants of the destroyed civilization, looking for upgrades to your armor and ghostly bow in order to become powerful enough and fulfill your destiny of vengeance. Do you have what it takes to be The Ghosthero?

Key Features:


🏰 Build and Battle: Defend your fortress against relentless waves of evil monsters. Strategize and fortify with walls, catapults, ballistas, and other weapons.

🌍 Open World: Explore the hauntingly beautiful remnants of your civilization, gathering essential resources for fortifications and ammunition. Uncover the secrets of your once-thriving world as you navigate its eerie landscapes.

🛡️ Survive and Conquer: Face the ultimate challenge as you strive to survive long enough to confront the colossal Evil Titan that decimated your world. Every decision counts in your quest for vengeance.



📖 Plot summary: The Evil Titan and his army of darkness have destroyed your civilization, creating a wasteland of death. You have been brought back by the forces of good to restore your fortress and survive long enough so you can build up your strength, exact revenge, and defeat him once and for all.

🌟 Inspiration: GHOSTHERO: Shadow of Vengeance seamlessly blends the strategic resource management of Kingdom with the epic scale and atmosphere of Shadow of the Colossus. We are big fans of both games and decided to combine gameplay elements that we love from both titles into one grand epic open-world game.

Are you ready to defy the boundaries of mortality? The forces of good await your vengeance - become the Ghosthero your world needs!

➡️ Next milestone: release a playable demo.

This game is a passion project by two developers. You can reach out via e-mail or Discord and share your suggestions and ideas - we listen to your feedback.

short_description: Command your fortress, build defenses, and fight waves of evil. Explore the open world, gather resources, upgrade and finally unleash vengeance on the Titans of Evil. A unique blend of defense, exploration and management. The game is a modern mix of Kingdom and Shadow of the Colossus.
